member.name: T:GameStop.StoreSystems.Logging.ILogging
member.summary: This interface is made available to store systems applications for implementing logging solutions.
member.remarks: The purpose of this interface is to ensure that store systems applications conform to a standard logging interface independent of the logging technology. Application development teams may decide which logging utilities fit best and implement the apropriate logging solution. Regardless of the technology, (EntLib, Log4Net, homegrown, etc), this interface provides the necessary abstraction required to insulate the application from technology changes and enable logging implementations to be mocked as part of a test fixture.
